verses.verse: Then <WG5119> was Jesus <WG2424> led up <WG321> of <WG5259> the <WG3588> spirit <WG4151> into <WG1519> the <WG3588> wilderness <WG2048> to be tempted <WG3985> of <WG5259> the <WG3588> devil. <WG1228>
And <WG2532> when he had fasted <WG3522> forty <WG5062> days <WG2250> and <WG2532> forty <WG5062> nights, <WG3571> he was afterward hungry. <WG3983> <WG5305>

And <WG2532> when the <WG3588> tempter <WG3985> came <WG4334> to him, <WG846> he said, <WG2036> If <WG1487> thou be <WG1488> the Son of <WG5207> God, <WG2316> command <WG2036> that <WG2443> these <WG3778> stones <WG3037> be made <WG1096> bread. <WG740>

But <WG1161> he <WG3588> answered <WG611> and said, <WG2036> It is written, <WG1125> Man <WG444> shall not <WG3756> live <WG2198> by <WG1909> bread <WG740> alone, <WG3441> but <WG235> by <WG1909> every <WG3956> word <WG4487> that proceedeth <WG1607> out of <WG1223> the mouth <WG4750> of God. <WG2316>

Then <WG5119> the <WG3588> devil <WG1228> taketh him up <WG3880> <WG846> into <WG1519> the <WG3588> holy <WG40> city, <WG4172> and <WG2532> setteth <WG2476> him <WG846> on <WG1909> a pinnacle <WG4419> of the <WG3588> temple, <WG2411>

And <WG2532> saith <WG3004> unto him, <WG846> If <WG1487> thou be <WG1488> the Son <WG5207> of God, <WG2316> cast <WG906> thyself <WG4572> down: <WG2736> for <WG1063> it is written, <WG1125> He shall give his angels charge <WG1781> <WG848> <WG32> concerning <WG4012> thee: <WG4675> and <WG2532> in <WG1909> their hands <WG5495> they shall bear thee up, <WG142> <WG4571> lest at any time <WG3379> thou dash <WG4350> thy <WG4675> foot <WG4228> against <WG4314> a stone. <WG3037>
Jesus <WG2424> said <WG5346> unto him, <WG846> It is written <WG1125> again, <WG3825> Thou shalt not <WG3756> tempt <WG1598> the Lord <WG2962> thy <WG4675> God. <WG2316>

Again, <WG3825> the <WG3588> devil <WG1228> taketh him up <WG3880> <WG846> into <WG1519> an exceeding <WG3029> high <WG5308> mountain, <WG3735> and <WG2532> showeth <WG1166> him <WG846> all <WG3956> the <WG3588> kingdoms <WG932> of the <WG3588> world, <WG2889> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> glory <WG1391> of them; <WG846>
And <WG2532> saith <WG3004> unto him, <WG846> All <WG3956> these things <WG5023> will I give <WG1325> thee, <WG4671> if <WG1437> thou wilt fall down <WG4098> and worship <WG4352> me. <WG3427>

Then <WG5119> saith <WG3004> Jesus <WG2424> unto him, <WG846> Get thee hence, <WG5217> Satan: <WG4567> for <WG1063> it is written, <WG1125> Thou shalt worship <WG4352> the Lord <WG2962> thy <WG4675> God, <WG2316> and <WG2532> him <WG846> only <WG3441> shalt thou serve. <WG3000>
Then <WG5119> the <WG3588> devil <WG1228> leaveth <WG863> him, <WG846> and, <WG2532> behold, <WG2400> angels <WG32> came <WG4334> and <WG2532> ministered <WG1247> unto him. <WG846>
Now <WG1161> when Jesus <WG2424> had heard <WG191> that <WG3754> John <WG2491> was cast into prison, <WG3860> he departed <WG402> into <WG1519> Galilee; <WG1056>

And <WG2532> leaving <WG2641> Nazareth, <WG3478> he came <WG2064> and dwelt <WG2730> in <WG1519> Capernaum, <WG2584> which is upon the sea coast, <WG3864> in <WG1722> the borders <WG3725> of Zebulun <WG2194> and <WG2532> Naphtali: <WG3508>
That <WG2443> it might be fulfilled <WG4137> which <WG3588> was spoken <WG4483> by <WG1223> Isaiah <WG2268> the <WG3588> prophet, <WG4396> saying, <WG3004>

The land <WG1093> of Zebulun, <WG2194> and <WG2532> the land <WG1093> of Naphtali, <WG3508> by the way <WG3598> of the sea, <WG2281> beyond <WG4008> Jordan, <WG2446> Galilee <WG1056> of the <WG3588> Gentiles; <WG1484>

The <WG3588> people <WG2992> which <WG3588> sat <WG2521> in <WG1722> darkness <WG4655> saw <WG1492> great <WG3173> light; <WG5457> and <WG2532> to them which sat <WG2521> in <WG1722> the region <WG5561> and <WG2532> shadow <WG4639> of death <WG2288> light <WG5457> is sprung up. <WG393>

From <WG575> that time <WG5119> Jesus <WG2424> began <WG756> to preach, <WG2784> and <WG2532> to say, <WG3004> Repent: <WG3340> for <WG1063> the <WG3588> kingdom <WG932> of heaven <WG3772> is at hand. <WG1448>

And <WG1161> Jesus, <WG2424> walking <WG4043> by <WG3844> the <WG3588> sea <WG2281> of Galilee, <WG1056> saw <WG1492> two <WG1417> brethren, <WG80> Simon <WG4613> called <WG3004> Peter, <WG4074> and <WG2532> Andrew <WG406> his <WG846> brother, <WG80> casting <WG906> a net <WG293> into <WG1519> the <WG3588> sea: <WG2281> for <WG1063> they were <WG2258> fishers. <WG231>
And <WG2532> he saith <WG3004> unto them, <WG846> Follow <WG1205> <WG3694> me, <WG3450> and <WG2532> I will make <WG4160> you <WG5209> fishers <WG231> of men. <WG444>
And <WG1161> they <WG3588> straightway <WG2112> left <WG863> their nets, <WG1350> and followed <WG190> him. <WG846>

And <WG2532> going on <WG4260> from thence, <WG1564> he saw <WG1492> other <WG243> two <WG1417> brethren, <WG80> James <WG2385> the <WG3588> son of Zebedee, <WG2199> and <WG2532> John <WG2491> his <WG846> brother, <WG80> in <WG1722> a ship <WG4143> with <WG3326> Zebedee <WG2199> their <WG846> father, <WG3962> mending <WG2675> their <WG848> nets; <WG1350> and <WG2532> he called <WG2564> them. <WG846>
And <WG1161> they immediately left <WG863> <WG2112> the <WG3588> ship <WG4143> and <WG2532> their <WG848> father, <WG3962> and <WG2532> followed <WG190> him. <WG846>

And <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> went about <WG4013> all <WG3650> Galilee, <WG1056> teaching <WG1321> in <WG1722> their <WG846> synagogues, <WG4864> and <WG2532> preaching <WG2784> the <WG3588> gospel <WG2098> of the <WG3588> kingdom, <WG932> and <WG2532> healing <WG2323> all manner <WG3956> of sickness <WG3554> and <WG2532> all manner <WG3956> of disease <WG3119> among <WG1722> the <WG3588> people. <WG2992>

And <WG2532> his <WG846> fame <WG189> went <WG565> throughout <WG1519> all <WG3650> Syria: <WG4947> and <WG2532> they brought <WG4374> unto him <WG846> all <WG3956> sick people <WG2192> <WG2560> that were taken <WG4912> with divers <WG4164> diseases <WG3554> and <WG2532> torments, <WG931> and <WG2532> those which were possessed with devils, <WG1139> and <WG2532> those which were lunatic, <WG4583> and <WG2532> those that had the palsy; <WG3885> and <WG2532> he healed <WG2323> them. <WG846>

And <WG2532> there followed <WG190> him <WG846> great <WG4183> multitudes of people <WG3793> from <WG575> Galilee, <WG1056> and <WG2532> from Decapolis, <WG1179> and <WG2532> from Jerusalem, <WG2414> and <WG2532> from Judea, <WG2449> and <WG2532> from beyond <WG4008> Jordan. <WG2446>
